channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain is blocked, 18th February
item.description:
This drain always has high water upto the grill. When it rains it ponds and causes issue for those waiting at the bus stop
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars going through red lights constantly, 18th February
item.description:
Car ignore the red lights I and others have nearly been hit by cars this happens daily with up to 6 cars going through red lights.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal Parade, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Box junction needs camera or enforcement, 18th February
item.description:
Cars coming from leesons hill stop on the box junction restricting traffic from st Paul's wood hill. There needs to be a camera there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Paul's Wood Hill, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge deep pot hole, 18th February
item.description:
This pot hole is so deep and large there is no road where the hole is so deep, no tarmac left, so deep thought id cracked my alloy is dangerous and very deep
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Plaistow Lane, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Area of road needs resurfacing, 18th February
item.description:
The road surface is in very poor condition With uneven and deteriorated sections. This is a bus route, and when buses and other heavy vehicles pass, it cause noticeable vibration Inside nearby residential properties. The road would benefit from inspection and resurfacing rather than temporary patch Repairs.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, Maylands Drive, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 paving slabs have sunk and moving, 18th February
item.description:
This have been here for over a year .trip hazard and break ankle hazard! ..water seeping in toshop basement ..this needs cement and a concrete base angled away from building ...guess rodent narrowing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Cross Road, New Cross Gate, Greater London

item.title: Parking on double yellows, 18th February
item.description:
Everyday people park on the double yellows and it obstructs our view especially the big vans

item.title: Impacted dead leaves cover the pavement causing slippery surface representing risk to pedestrians including children, 18th February
item.description:
Sodden leaves from trees are impacted on the pavement in Kemsing Road behind Halstow Road school. These constitute a risk to pedestrians using the pavement to reach the school and exit from the premises.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kemsing Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hole in road, 18th February
item.description:
Small holes in the road -heath rise. I crossed the road and foot went in the hole opposite number 24 and fell, it is a school road where families cross. Please fill the small holes in, properly and fully. Only the middle part was filled in, pram wheels could get caught in gaps at ends.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heath Rise, Hayes, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on my private property, 18th February
item.description:
Someone has left their belongings (looks to be for rubbish for the tip) on my private property whilst I was at work today (18th Feb).

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Allen Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Council wheeling bin, 18th February
item.description:
This food collection wheeling bin was left by the bin collection crew 2 weeks ago. I approached them today asking the bin should be taken away but, they still left it. The bin is currently being used by the public.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakdene Avenue, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
